mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_DAKA_USERINFO WHERE avatarurl IS NOT NULL ORDER BY todaysteps DESC, ID DESC LIMIT 0 ,15
SELECT * FROM T_DAKA_USERINFO WHERE avatarurl IS NOT NULL ORDER BY monthkeepcount DESC, monthsteps DESC, ID DESC LIMIT 0 ,15
SELECT * FROM T_DAKA_USERINFO WHERE avatarurl IS NOT NULL ORDER BY keepcount DESC, steps DESC LIMIT 0 ,15
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DAKA_USERINFO SET todaysteps = 0 WHERE todaysteps > 0
update T_DAKA_USERINFO set preMonthKeepCount = monthKeepCount, monthKeepCount = 0, preMonthSteps = monthSteps, monthSteps=0

UPDATE T_DAKA_USERINFO
openid = #{openid},
nickname = #{nickname},
avatarurl = #{avatarurl},
avatarlocal = #{avatarlocal},
weight = #{weight},
height = #{height},
todaysteps = #{todaysteps},
steps = #{steps},
keepcount = #{keepcount},
premonthkeepcount = #{premonthkeepcount},
monthkeepcount = #{monthkeepcount},
kms = #{kms},
caloris = #{caloris},
myreward = #{myreward},
mypoint = #{mypoint},
lastday = #{lastday},
premonthsteps = #{premonthsteps},
monthsteps = #{monthsteps},
resigncount = #{resigncount},
gender = #{gender},
usertype = #{usertype},
wxid = #{wxid},
country = #{country},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
address = #{address},
WHERE ID = #{id}

UPDATE T_DAKA_USERINFO
nickname = #{nickname},
avatarurl = #{avatarurl},
avatarlocal = #{avatarlocal},

height = #{height},
todaysteps = #{todaysteps},
steps = #{steps},
